title: 01/01/21 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 01/01/21 - Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, Colin explains why you shouldn’t discredit Notre Dame as a college football powerhouse even if they get blown out by Alabama in the college football playoff. He also argues for Clemson quarterback Trevor Lawrence to be considered the greatest college QB of all time. Plus, NFL insider Albert Breer joins the show and tells Colin why the Dolphins might consider moving on from 1st round pick Tua Tagovailoa after just one season. Finally, Colin discusses the Ravens' offense as the regular season ends and why Baltimore could be a dangerous team in the playoffs. 


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
